name: AD men
description:
Cody Baird has been involved with all things "search" since 2005. In 2011, he founded admen.com, a firm specializing in local search marketing and local brand strategy.
Our vision is to shine a light on local greatness. The Beaumont Hotel, Tacodeli, Franklin BBQ, or the Driskill in Austin. We cringe to think of a world with Applebee's but no Franklin BBQ, Hyatt's but no Driskell Hotel. We love original local business. Locals love their hometown, neighbors, and do what is best for them.
READ MORE...
